ESPUI_BEGIN_MESSAGE0: Initialize ESPUI Interface Title %1 Username %2 Password %3
ESPUI_BEGIN_TOOLTIP: Initialize ESPUI interface with title and access credentials
ESPUI_SWITCHER_MESSAGE0: Create Switch Text %1 Color %2 Initial State %3
ESPUI_SLIDER_MESSAGE0: Create Slider Text %1 Color %2 Min %3 Max %4 Initial Value %5
ESPUI_TEXT_MESSAGE0: Create Text Input Text %1 Color %2 Initial Value %3
ESPUI_NUMBER_MESSAGE0: Create Number Input Text %1 Color %2 Min %3 Max %4 Initial Value %5
ESPUI_GAUGE_MESSAGE0: Create Gauge Text %1 Color %2 Min %3 Max %4 Initial Value %5
ESPUI_UPDATE_CONTROL_TOOLTIP: Update the value of specified control
ESPUI_UPDATE_LABEL_TOOLTIP: Update the label text of specified control
ESPUI_ON_EVENT_MESSAGE0: When Control Event Triggered Control ID %1 Event Type %2 %3 Execute %4
ESPUI_GET_VALUE_TOOLTIP: Get the current value of specified control
ESPUI_ADD_GRAPH_POINT_MESSAGE0: Add Graph Point Graph ID %1 Value %2
ESPUI_ADD_GRAPH_POINT_TOOLTIP: Add a data point to specified graph
ESPUI_CLEAR_GRAPH_TOOLTIP: Clear all data points from specified graph
ESPUI_WIFI_SETUP_TOOLTIP: Configure WiFi connection or hotspot mode
ESPUI_WIFI_STATUS_TOOLTIP: Check if WiFi is connected successfully
ESPUI_GET_IP_TOOLTIP: Get current ESP device IP address
